titleStmt.title: The altar of Damascus or the patern of the English hierarchie, and Church policie obtruded upon the Church of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Calderwood, David, 1575-1650.

notesStmt.note: The name of the author, David Calderwood, appears on p. 222, though he is not named as the author.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
